alert.note: Alert for Mahaska; Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:26PM CDT until May 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN POWESHIEK AND NORTHEASTERN MAHASKA COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coal Creek, or 12 miles south of Montezuma, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Poweshiek and northeastern Mahaska Counties, including the following locations... Barnes City and Rose Hill. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
